text: During his life, Ibis the Invincible, a Fawcett Comics superhero with magical powers, has met many enemies. Here is a list of a few of them in alphabetical order. *Apollyon *Black Rufe *Black Pharaoh *The Cat *Charon *Dalaghar *Gorgons *Hamed *Karnok *Moon-men *Murder Malone *Ra-Tuth *Trug *Vampire Twins
title: List of Ibis the Invincible enemies
